Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Villa Garden in Sant'Agnello, you'll be on the waterfront and convenient to Villa Fondi and Piazza Tasso. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Centro Benessere Shiva Emotional Spa and Museo Correale di Terranova.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 19 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and lunch, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
